[Stuart Jackson Gallery, Toronto, Canada, acquired in France, 2002-March 2025];] [Bonham’s, New York, “Fine Japanese and Korean Art, including the Alan and Simone Hartman Collection of Japanese Art,” March 20, 2025, lot 510]; purchased by the Princeton University Art Museum, March 20, 2025.
